mapper.sql: area.id as id , area.create_time as createTime , area.creator as creator , area.creator_id as creatorId , area.valid as valid , area.update_time as updateTime , area.updator as updator , area.updator_id as updatorId , area.pid as pid , area.short_map_name as shortMapName , area.short_name as shortName , area.spelling as spelling , area.state as state , area.type as type , area.zip as zip , area.name as name
mapper.insert:
insert into area_tb
id,
create_time,
creator,
creator_id,
valid,
update_time,
updator,
updator_id,
pid,
short_map_name,
short_name,
spelling,
state,
type,
zip,
name,
#{id},
#{createTime},
#{creator},
#{creatorId},
#{valid},
#{updateTime},
#{updator},
#{updatorId},
#{pid},
#{shortMapName},
#{shortName},
#{spelling},
#{state},
#{type},
#{zip},
#{name},
mapper.update:
update area_tb
create_time = #{createTime},
creator = #{creator},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
valid = #{valid},
update_time = #{updateTime},
updator = #{updator},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
pid = #{pid},
short_map_name = #{shortMapName},
short_name = #{shortName},
spelling = #{spelling},
state = #{state},
type = #{type},
zip = #{zip},
name = #{name},
where id = #{id}
